court: C.W.P. No.10082 of 2012 -1- IN THE HIGH COURT OF PUNJAB & HARYANA AT CHANDIGARH. C.W.P. No.10082 of 2012 (O&M) DATE OF DECISION : 29.8.2012 Narinder Aggarwal PETITIONER VERSUS The State of Punjab and others RESPONDENTS CORAM : HON'BLE MR.JUSTICE MAHESH GROVER Present:- Shri A.P.Jagga, Advocate for the petitioner. Shri Ranvir S.Chauhan, D.A.G. Punjab. Shri Rajesh Mahajan, Advocate for respondent-4. MAHESH GROVER, J. Reply has been filed in Court today which is taken on record. A copy of the same has been given to the counsel for the petitioner. In para-5 of the reply it has been stated that after the receipt of no objection affidavits from Satish Kumar and Vinay Kumar i.e. the persons to whom the property had been sold earlier, process has been initiated to cancel two mutations No.21635 and 21644 pertaining to land measuring 37.5 sq.yds. and 47.5 sq.yds. respectively. It has further been stated that subsequent to the cancellation , the area would be transferred back in the name of Davinder Kaur, the original C.W.P. No.10082 of 2012 -2- owner and thereafter the necessary proceedings would be adopted to sanction the mutation in the name of the petitioner. This has resulted in the satisfaction of the claim of the petitioner. The writ petition is therefore, disposed of as having become infructuous. However, directions are given to the respondents to complete the necessary process as expeditiously as possibly, preferably within two months from today. (MAHESH GROVER) August 29, 2012 JUDGE GD WHETHER TO BE REFERRED TO REPORTER? YES/NO
